interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: PHOERA 30ml Foundation Liquid Full Coverage 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer (Nude & Buff Beige) with 6ml Makeup Face Primer & Kabuki Foundation Brush Flat Top
Review Date: 2020/09/24
Store: SIGHTLING
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.79 x 1.18 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '779296966696'}
Review Text: They are a bit too light for my skin tone but they work.  The toner is so silky I wasn't even sure any was going on my skin.  I am almost 52 and have the expected lines in my face for that age.  The toner is a must for mature skin. I tried it without it and the foundation settled in my lines. With the toner it stayed suspended well.  The foundations are a bit thick and it felt like I was painting my face on, but with a bit of work it blended nicely. The kabuki brush is soft and full. No bristles came off.  I believe if the shade matches your skin well, it would be an excellent product. I did have to apply a bronzer over because it was a bit lighter than my skin.  Full coverage, matte finish.
Review Title: Great toner, great brush.  Full coverage, matte finish
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} I do like that the 3 different grit rollers can be flipped right on the head. It is quiet. I charged it several hours before using it, but it began lagging quickly. I plugged it in and kept using it and didn't notice much difference while plugged in. The description recommend only use 2 or 3 seconds at a time but I didn't find any reason why it would say that. It wasn't very powerful, but I did see a considerable amount of very fine skin. It didn't collect in the little tray that I could tell. It claims to work wet or dry. I will leave the wet testing to someone with less candles on their cake than I. My feet felt better after using.
I believe there are better ones than this at a competitive price point. It did work so I have to give it at least 3 ☆☆☆. It was quiet so that's a plus. The charge cord is very short. It's quiet. Not super powerful ZOCONE 10 Packs Boho Headbands for Women Girls, Turban Headwraps for Sports Yoga Running Workout, Elastic Fashion Hair Band (A) ZOCONE {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Fabric Type': 'Polyester,Silk', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Brand': 'ZOCONE', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 4.41 x 2.83 inches; 6.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'j158'} Nothing but good to say about this item. The bands were soft fabric, tight enough to hold hair back but not so tight it felt constricting. Several patterns and colors to match about any solid color top. Slipped into place easily and stayed there. I am pleased with this item's quality and variety. Soft fabric. Well constructed. Stays in place. Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits {'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'} The light is small and shallow. Thumb has to cure separately. This "complete" kit is not exactly complete. It has a micro USB cord but no box. Very basic nstructions. No times noted for curing. No color included. Assuming I cured for the correct time, I had a couple nails that smudged off when I wiped with alcohol. Most didn't. Top coat is exceptionally shiny. I have other Red Carpet items that I'm quite pleased with. This kit fell a bit short on expectations. As a starter kit, it's one you'll have to add a few things to (file, USB box, nail color, etc.) so be aware of that. The Purify cleaner has a light scent, but is a small bottle. I like the top coat. Kit is decent but not great. Not exactly a starter kit Biutee Starry Sky Nail Gel Firework Nail Gel With black Nail Polish Gel 8ml UV LED Biutee {'Brand': 'Biutee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '3.5274 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.92 x 3.31 x 1.77 inches; 4.59 Ounces'} You will need base and top coat and a scooper/brush tool. They are not included. It took 3 coats of the black polish (included) to get full, dark coverage. The pots are messy to open and quite small, but colors are pretty and sparkly. Lots of glitter effect with multiple coats. You will need a brush as well. The finish feels bumpy (you can feel the glitter). Maybe multiple top coat would help but I didn't want more layers since I already had base, 3 layers of color, 2 layers of glitter and a top coat. Pots are kinda messy. No base, top coat or brush. Glitter is pretty. PHOERA 30ml Foundation Liquid Full Coverage 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer (Nude & Buff Beige) with 6ml Makeup Face Primer & Kabuki Foundation Brush Flat Top SIGHTLING {'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.79 x 1.18 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '779296966696'} They are a bit too light for my skin tone but they work. The toner is so silky I wasn't even sure any was going on my skin. I am almost 52 and have the expected lines in my face for that age. The toner is a must for mature skin. I tried it without it and the foundation settled in my lines. With the toner it stayed suspended well. The foundations are a bit thick and it felt like I was painting my face on, but with a bit of work it blended nicely. The kabuki brush is soft and full. No bristles came off. I believe if the shade matches your skin well, it would be an excellent product. I did have to apply a bronzer over because it was a bit lighter than my skin. Full coverage, matte finish. Great toner, great brush. Full coverage, matte finish
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Category Preference**: The user continues to favor personal care tools, especially in foot care, pedicure, and now increasingly in makeup products, specifically foundations and primers. Their interest in nail care products remains strong, complemented by their exploration of fashion accessories.

- **Performance Expectations**: They have a keen desire for comprehensive product solutions that meet their needs, seeking items that deliver full functionality and quality. Recent experiences have elevated their expectations, particularly regarding makeup applications—emphasizing coverage and finish.

- **Features Importance**: Quiet operation is still vital, along with customizable fit and aesthetic value. Their latest feedback highlights an appreciation for usability, with particular emphasis on product texture and blendability, while also noting potential issues around shade matching.

- **Value Sensitivity**: The user meticulously compares products to guarantee effective performance correlating with price. Their scrutiny now extends into makeup items, consistent with their critical appraisal of cost-effectiveness.

- **Positive Experiences**: They recognize quality craftsmanship across categories, but their heightened expectations demand products that excel in completeness and ease of use.

- **Long-term Use**: The user prefers durable products that can offer reliable performance over time, reflecting their overarching commitment to quality and comprehensive functionality in their personal care and beauty regime.

Overall, the user’s engagement has expanded to include makeup products, while maintaining their established priorities for practicality, quality, and a seamless user experience.
